subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Liverpool is set to hire Brendan Rodgers as its coach. Rodgers told his current club, Swansea, that he had been offered the job as Kenny Dalglish’s replacement.
snippet: Liverpool is set to hire Brendan Rodgers as its coach. Rodgers told his current club, Swansea, that he had been offered the job as Kenny Dalglish’s replacement.
